statements: SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT company_name, risk_category FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, company_name, risk_level FROM risk_assessment_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT company_name, risk_category, compliance_status FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_level = 'Low' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_category = 'Cybersecurity' AND compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT id, company_name, risk_category, risk_level, compliance_status FROM risk_assessment_data;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_level = 'High';

SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT id, risk_category, compliance_status FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData
SELECT entity_name, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData ORDER BY entity_name DESC
SELECT risk_score, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 50
SELECT entity_name, assessment_date, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE entity_name='Company A'
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData ORDER BY compliance_date
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, risk_score FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score <= 50;
SELECT entity_name, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT entity_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT entity_name, risk_score, compliance_status FROM RiskAssessmentData INNER JOIN ComplianceData ON RiskAssessmentData.entity_name = ComplianceData.entity_name;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data;
SELECT company_name, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_score > 70;
SELECT regulatory_body, requirement_name FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY regulatory_body ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, assessment_result FROM assessment_history WHERE TIMESTAMP >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_score > 80 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM assessment_history INNER JOIN risk_assessment_data ON assessment_history.risk_assessment_id = risk_assessment_data.id;
SELECT company_name, risk_score, compliance_status FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND risk_score < 50 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, assessment_result FROM assessment_history WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data;
SELECT entity_name, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT id, entity_name FROM compliance_issues WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT standard_name, compliance_deadline FROM regulatory_standards WHERE compliance_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assessment_history WHERE assessment_result LIKE '%pass%';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_score > 50 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT entity_name, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY risk_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE severity_level = 'High' AND issue_category = 'Policy' ORDER BY id;
SELECT entity_name, issue_description FROM compliance_issues WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(issue_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_standards WHERE compliance_deadline < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data;
SELECT company_name, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE compliance_status='High';

SELECT category_name FROM risk_categories WHERE category_id=1;
SELECT company_id, contact_name, contact_email FROM company_contacts;
